titles.title: For the relief of Eugene Makuch.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/27/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to Eugene Makuch of East Amherst, New York, in compensation for the lifetime aggregate value of benefits earned but not received by him for his service for the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
